languages.text: "Храни вас Император, Лорд-капитан. Мы прикроем с тыла, если враг полезет из туннелей. Будьте осторожны — мутанты успели заминировать блокпост... Но они кое-чего не знали". {n}Кляйн хищно прищуривается и протягивает вам небольшой медный стержень с разъемом.{/n}

"Emperor protect you, Lord Captain. We will cover the rear if the enemy comes out of the tunnels. Be careful: the mutants have mined the guard post. But there is something they didn't know." {n}Klein squints nastily and hand you a small copper rod with a connector.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Храни вас Император, Лорд-капитан. Мы прикроем с тыла, если враг полезет из туннелей. Будьте осторожны — мутанты успели заминировать блокпост... Но они кое-чего не знали". {n}Кляйн хищно прищуривается и протягивает вам небольшой медный стержень с разъемом.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Emperor protect you, Lord Captain. We will cover the rear if the enemy comes out of the tunnels. Be careful, the mutants have mind the guard post, except there is something they didn't know". {n}Klein squints nastily and hand you a small copper rod with a connector.{/n}

"Emperor protect you, Lord Captain. We will cover the rear if the enemy comes out of the tunnels. Be careful, the mutants have mind the guard post, except there is something they didn't know". {n}Klein squints nastily and hand you a small copper rod with a connector.{/n}

"Emperor protect you, Lord Captain. We will cover the rear if the enemy comes out of the tunnels. Be careful: the mutants have mined the guard post. But there is something they didn't know." {n}Klein squints nastily and hand you a small copper rod with a connector.{/n}

languages.text: «Que el Emperador l{mf|e|a} proteja, Lord Capitán. Cubriremos la retaguardia si el enemigo ataca desde los túneles. Tenga cuidado: los mutantes han minado el puesto de guardia. Pero hay algo que no saben». {n}Klein entrecierra los ojos con malicia y te entrega una varilla de cobre con un conector.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Emperor protect you, Lord Captain. We will cover the rear if the enemy comes out of the tunnels. Be careful: the mutants have mined the guard post. But there is something they didn't know." {n}Klein squints nastily and hand you a small copper rod with a connector.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Que el Emperador l{mf|e|a} proteja, Lord Capitán. Cubriremos la retaguardia si el enemigo ataca desde los túneles. Tenga cuidado: los mutantes han minado el puesto de guardia. Pero hay algo que no saben». {n}Klein entrecierra los ojos con malicia y te entrega una varilla de cobre con un conector.{/n}

languages.text: 「皇帝のご加護を、ロード・キャプテン。敵がトンネルから出てきたら、後方を援護します。お気をつけください。変異体が駐屯所に地雷を仕掛けました。ただ、相手が知らなかったことがあります」{n}クラインは意地悪そうに目を細め、コネクターのついた小さな銅の杖を手渡す。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Emperor protect you, Lord Captain. We will cover the rear if the enemy comes out of the tunnels. Be careful: the mutants have mined the guard post. But there is something they didn't know." {n}Klein squints nastily and hand you a small copper rod with a connector.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「皇帝のご加護を、ロード・キャプテン。敵がトンネルから出てきたら、後方を援護します。お気をつけください。変異体が駐屯所に地雷を仕掛けました。ただ、相手が知らなかったことがあります」{n}クラインは意地悪そうに目を細め、コネクターのついた小さな銅の杖を手渡す。{/n}

languages.text: “愿帝皇保佑您，舰长大人。我们会掩护后方，以免敌人从隧道里钻出来。要当心，那些变种人在哨站里埋了地雷，不过有件事情他们并不清楚。”{n}克莱因眯起眼睛，递给你一根带着接头的小型数据棒。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Emperor protect you, Lord Captain. We will cover the rear if the enemy comes out of the tunnels. Be careful: the mutants have mined the guard post. But there is something they didn't know." {n}Klein squints nastily and hand you a small copper rod with a connector.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “愿帝皇保佑您，舰长大人。我们会掩护后方，以免敌人从隧道里钻出来。要当心，那些变种人在哨站里埋了地雷，不过有件事情他们并不清楚。”{n}克莱因眯起眼睛，递给你一根带着接头的小型数据棒。{/n}

languages.text: "Der Imperator beschütze Euch, Lord Captain. Wenn der Feind aus den Tunneln kommt, sichern wir den hinteren Bereich ab. Seid auf der Hut: Die Mutanten haben die Wachposten vermint. Es gibt aber etwas, was sie nicht wussten." {n}Klein grinst diabolisch und überreicht dir eine kleine Kupferstange mit einem Steckanschluss.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Emperor protect you, Lord Captain. We will cover the rear if the enemy comes out of the tunnels. Be careful: the mutants have mined the guard post. But there is something they didn't know." {n}Klein squints nastily and hand you a small copper rod with a connector.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Der Imperator beschütze Euch, Lord Captain. Wenn der Feind aus den Tunneln kommt, sichern wir den hinteren Bereich ab. Seid auf der Hut: Die Mutanten haben die Wachposten vermint. Es gibt aber etwas, was sie nicht wussten." {n}Klein grinst diabolisch und überreicht dir eine kleine Kupferstange mit einem Steckanschluss.{/n}

languages.text: « Que l'Empereur-Dieu vous protège, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. On se charge de couvrir vos arrières, au cas où l'ennemi déboulerait des tunnels. Soyez prudents : les mutants ont piégé le poste de garde. Par contre, il y a une chose qu'ils ignorent. » {n}Klein vous lance un regard sadique en vous tendant une petite tige de cuivre dotée d'un connecteur.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Emperor protect you, Lord Captain. We will cover the rear if the enemy comes out of the tunnels. Be careful: the mutants have mined the guard post. But there is something they didn't know." {n}Klein squints nastily and hand you a small copper rod with a connector.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Que l'Empereur-Dieu vous protège, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. On se charge de couvrir vos arrières, au cas où l'ennemi déboulerait des tunnels. Soyez prudents : les mutants ont piégé le poste de garde. Par contre, il y a une chose qu'ils ignorent. » {n}Klein vous lance un regard sadique en vous tendant une petite tige de cuivre dotée d'un connecteur.{/n}

languages.text: "İmparator sizi korusun Lord Kaptan. Düşman tünellerden gelirse diye arka tarafı kollayacağız. Dikkatli olun. Mutantlar, nöbete noktasına mayın döşedi. Tabii bilmedikleri bir şey var." {n}Klein, gözlerini kinle kısıp sana üstünde bağlantı noktası bulunan ufak bir bakır çubuk veriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Emperor protect you, Lord Captain. We will cover the rear if the enemy comes out of the tunnels. Be careful: the mutants have mined the guard post. But there is something they didn't know." {n}Klein squints nastily and hand you a small copper rod with a connector.{/n}
